title: Real Sci-Fi Weapons SFX Library
description: Real Science Fiction Weapons is the ultimate library of high-quality, futuristic weapon sounds for the Unreal Engine.
longDescription:
Click here to listen!


GlowMachine is proud to present the Real Sci-Fi Weapons SFX library!


Bring your futuristic guns, laser weapons, and energy shields to life with more than 500 sounds in both stereo and mono formats. Create sniper rifle shots that thunder across the sky, flame throwers that crackle and burn as they melt your enemies, and hi-tech pistol weapons for close combat. The Real Sci-Fi Weapons SFX library has you covered!


Gunshot sounds include dry variations as well as versions with short, medium, and long reverb tails.


Complete your weapon audio systems by integrating the included hit markers and 'kill confirmed' sounds. Add detail with realistic-sounding bullet shells and casings, handling noise, charging loops, whizbys, whooshes, sweeteners, alarms, and much more!


Categories include:


  • Primary Weapons
  • Flame Throwers
  • Grenade Launchers
  • Laser Guns
  • Plasma Weapons
  • Pulse Weapons
  • Rifles
  • Shotguns
  • Sniper Rifles
  • Secondary Weapons
  • Pistols
  • Mines
  • Miscellaneous
  • Charging
  • Handling
  • Hit Markers
  • Kill Confirmed
  • Overheating
  • Pickups
  • Scopes
  • Shells
  • Sweeteners
  • Tails
  • Whizbys
  • Whooshes
  • Recharging
  • Reloading
  • Shields
  • Turrets
  • Warning


GlowMachine Sound Design is committed to providing you the best possible SFX libraries. If you have feedback or would like to hear something particular in the next version of Real Science Fiction Weapons, drop us a line at GlowMachineSoundDesign@gmail.com.


Also, if you would like to see your project showcased on our social media platforms/website, contact us at GlowMachineSoundDesign@gmail.com.


If you are in need of bespoke sound design, weâ€™d love to work with you. Contact us at GlowMachineSoundDesign@gmail.com.
